instruction: Analyze the user's request and filter the provided list of messages to return only the relevant ones. Return the indices of messages that match the user's criteria.

roles.name: request_analyzer
roles.description: Understand the user's filtering request and identify what criteria to apply (date, category, source, urgency, etc.)

roles.name: message_filter
roles.description: Apply the identified criteria to filter through the message list and return only matching message indices
